publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. G[rismond] printer to the said Commissioners,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Arms 62; Steele notation: Reigne, bans Officer.
Dated and signed at end: Given at the office of his Majesties vvorkes in Scotland-Yard, the 17th day of July 1662. Mo. Newport [and 10 others].
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
